meanings.definition: The quality or state of being substantial.
meanings.sent1: The substantialnesses of the building's foundation ensured its stability.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the substantialnesses of different materials.
meanings.sent3: The debate over the substantialnesses of the cake's ingredients was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness added a substantialnesses to the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The substantialnesses of the mountain's peak took our breath away.

meanings.definition: The amount or degree of substance.
meanings.sent1: The substantialnesses of water in the glass was just enough for a sip.
meanings.sent2: He was impressed by the substantialnesses of the meal served at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The substantialnesses of the ice cream scoop made it a delightful treat.
meanings.sent4: The substantialnesses of her savings allowed her to plan a vacation.
meanings.sent5: The substantialnesses of the tree's trunk made it seem unmovable.

meanings.definition: The importance or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: The substantialnesses of the decision weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent2: She realized the substantialnesses of her role in the project.
meanings.sent3: The substantialnesses of the cat's nap in the sun was comically exaggerated.
meanings.sent4: The substantialnesses of his words resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The substantialnesses of the trophy symbolized their hard work.
